scripts.test:pre: shx rm -rf coverage/ .nyc_output/ && cd ../backend && yarn build:coverage
scripts.test: yarn test:pre && COVERAGE=true dotenv -- playwright test && nyc report --report-dir coverage
scripts.test:skip-setup: yarn test:pre && COVERAGE=true SKIP_SETUP=true dotenv -- playwright test && nyc report --report-dir coverage
scripts.test:debug: COVERAGE=true DEBUG=true dotenv -- playwright test --debug --project='iPad Mini landscape'
scripts.test:debug:skip-setup: COVERAGE=true SKIP_SETUP=true DEBUG=true dotenv -- playwright test --debug --project='iPad Mini landscape'
